label: conflict
src_text: I literally don't even understand how you made that jump in my understanding of Islam.
augmented_text: It's mind-boggling how you managed to come up with that interpretation of Islam.

label: conflict
src_text: I was offering valid constructive criticism, it's not my fault you took it as a personal attack.
augmented_text: I intended to give you useful suggestions, but you perceived it as an aggression towards you.

label: conflict
src_text: I don't even know why you posted this when you aren't listening to what everyone else is saying.
augmented_text: It seems odd that you'd share something so controversial and then refuse to take part in the discussion.

label: conflict
src_text: It taints your perceived intentions and we can't just ignore that reality.
augmented_text: This issue is unavoidably shaping how your actions are seen, and ignoring it won't help.

label: conflict
src_text: But I don't need to know about it or have your views shoved down my throat, I honestly don't care.
augmented_text: I have zero interest in what you're saying, so don't bother sharing it.

label: conflict
src_text: What how dare you my racism is totally different from their racism!
augmented_text: Are you blind? There's a world of difference between my values and their disgusting racism!

label: conflict
src_text: You can't tell me she wouldn't have been a more qualified or noble candidate than the jack ass we elected.
augmented_text: It's beyond me how anyone could not see her as a vastly more proficient and virtuous candidate than the one we're stuck with now.

label: conflict
src_text: If you go through my profile, you will see that I am dealing with my own politically charged personal nightmare.
augmented_text: When you browse my page, you'll understand that I'm also grappling with a highly politicized personal nightmare.

label: conflict
src_text: And be sure to read why we disagree with some of your stances!
augmented_text: Have to point out that I don't quite agree with some of your ideas; we definitely have our differences.

label: conflict
src_text: I don't even know why you posted this when you aren't listening to what everyone else is saying.
augmented_text: It's apparent that you posted this without any intention to understand or engage with the differing opinions in the comments.

label: conflict
src_text: To answer you're meaningless question, no I would not support a foreign power meddling in our elections.
augmented_text: To appease your baseless inquest, I absolutely detest the idea of foreign bodies interfering with our democratic elections.

label: conflict
src_text: To answer you're meaningless question, no I would not support a foreign power meddling in our elections.
augmented_text: Regarding your needless questioning, I absolutely oppose any foreign entity meddling in our democratic processes.

label: conflict
src_text: He deserved a "fuck you" for the comment he made.
augmented_text: Honestly, a "shove it" seemed justified considering what he said.

label: conflict
src_text: You can despise my comment as much as you like but it changes nothing, it's objective fact.
augmented_text: Go ahead and disagree with my comment, but it doesn't alter the reality - it's just factual information.

label: conflict
src_text: The fact that people like you no longer recognize natural rights and freedoms is rather sad for our democracy.
augmented_text: It's lamentable that people like you seem to neglect natural rights as the heart of our democratic system.
